name: Color Through
description:
Download Color Through – Aa color now and don´t get dizzy with this incredible colour game! The
colour cycle will go and you will have to avoid the colour and send the ball through the free space! You
will have to go as fast as you can!

Our Color Through – Aa color app has been developed for you to enjoy a fun and exciting game with
awesome features. We have designed a game for a unique experience, you will be able to improve your
score and automatically increase the level of difficulty. The more advanced you will become, the more
the game difficulty will increase automatically, so do not get dizzy!

The game is completely free of crashes and created with awesome designs and graphics for you to enjoy
hours of fun! Do not get dizzy and become a master at our Color Through – Aa color app.
Download it now and start playing! The best colour game available on the market.

◇◇◇Color Through features◇◇◇
Ø The most intuitive and user friendly colour game application
Ø Automatic level increase whith user score
Ø Incredible designs and graphics
Ø Available for all Iphone and Ipad devices
